abstract: The Walt Disney Company said it would acquire 49 percent of Seven TV in a deal to introduce a nationally broadcast version of the Disney Channel in Russia, The New York Times's Brooks Barnes reports.
snippet: The Walt Disney Company said it would acquire 49 percent of Seven TV in a deal to introduce a nationally broadcast version of the Disney Channel in Russia, The New York Times's Brooks Barnes reports.

headline.main: Disney in TV Deal in Russia
